dict.string:
Disables the notification/quick reply banner tap 'to dismiss' gesture. Useful if you find yourself accidentally dismissing the QR banner by tapping below it.
Notes: I titled this patch similar to that of the Cydia tweak, "NoTouchCancelReply" as I assume they perform the same function. Also, this patch is not needed if you're already using my old patch titled "NoQuickDismiss".
[v.1] Tested with an iP6+ 8.4. (9-5-15)
★ If you'd like to donate via PayPal, please send money to...
